assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Triheptanoin_InitialRenewal_INITIATION_Q7_R5
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: e. Did the patient experience any of the following? Select all that apply
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: Severe pain (DEFINED AS: EXERCISE INDUCED MUSCLE PAIN INTERFERING WITH ABILITY TO PARTICIPATE IN ACTIVITIES; OR EXERCISE INDUCED MUSCLE PAIN SUFFICIENT TO REQUIRE HOSPITALIZATION OR ER VISIT; OR MUSCLE PAIN REQUIRING THE USE OF NARCOTICS) Compartment syndrome - Requiring surgery Not requiring surgery - Requiring surgery Acute renal injury requiring medical intervention - Resolved by dialysis Acute renal injury requiring medical intervention - Requiring dialysis Acute renal injury requiring medical intervention - Hyperkalemia requiring treatment
